name: Npigs
description:
Npigs is a tricolor arcade game where you command N pigs. Made in 48 hours.

In Npigs your goal is to get all of your pigs as high as possible. The catch is that the higher you climb, the more pigs you have to move around and prevent from falling. Your score is equal to the number of pigs multiplied by the height of the lowest pig. So, if you drop to the ground your score drops to 0!

(Okay and by pigs I mean those things that look certainly nothing like pigs)

Rate Npigs on LDJAM!
